>
> Or remove her ability to animation cancer.

I think cancers in general should be removed.
the problem with this is that animation cancelling is not unique to Riven. Many champions can do it. Jayce for example.

So fix them all.

Cast points exist for a reason and is one of the balancing aspect of an individual skill / mechanism. 

Just because multiple champions can animation cancel doesn't mean animation cancelling is not abused to bypass integral game mechanics. 

Balancing a champion around the player's ability to abuse a bug is even worse.

And 2 AoE CC abilities... and extreme mobility... and an long range AoE execute... and a huge AD steroid with her ult... all on top of having some of the lowest cooldowns in the game. Nice job Riot!

Self heal

Is Tryndamere op? No not really. An even better example is Galio but I don't remember what all of his abilities do exactly.

Except that the sheer number of things on the list would be far longer with an OP champion. I can name probably 10 things with Riven and other overloaded champions, like Ekko, while someone like Galio would have such a tiny list.

And honestly Tryndamere is cancer too.

I'm saying that you can list the raw abilities and on pen and paper it sounds OP, like Galio's ult. But unfortunately Galio is simply not very unique and there is no reason to pick him over anyone else.

Has low mana costs till level 11
has a free DoT on attack
Map Control that slows and does damage over time
passive speed steroid that can double itself when activated
passive that allows stealth and grants atk speed steroid on moving

And that, is my main, who is {{champion:17}}, I shall play him till the end my lovely friends.

Heimer is preeeeeety cancerous.

Put turrets all around you: free protection, reliable harass you don't even have to work for(they target automaticaly without any sort of player interaction), constant dps, free zoning, free damage resource throughout the game. 

They automaticaly push the lane for you, granting you cs and free trades, while you sit calmly behind them. Automaticaly render any attempts at harass and jungle ganks pointless because you're just going to out-trade everyone no matter what and good luck being killed when you already have 3 turrets down, and another 2 damaging abilities with CC to boot like you weren't at a big enough advantage already. Even if you do get killed, it takes a braindead player to not get away with a 1for1 trade especialy when you can just R+Q. 

As if the "go away or prepare to get fucked while being unable to do anything about it without me having to sweat press 1 button win game ability zones you for the whole laning phase area of control ON DEMAND" zone Heimerdinger's turrets create, you have 2 ranged harass abilities to spare, one of them having CC, the other constant harass at a low cost, both of them being ridiculously ranged considering the fact that you just can't get close to him. 

With your ultimate you can further boost your oppressive skillset to the point of disgust, allowing you a guaranteed lane without breaking a sweat and your enemies to have no fun for the whole game. Your itemization solves all your sustain issues despite you not really having any to begin with(unlike Riven who HAS to buy items to get sustain since the nerfs long ago). Mobility is not an issue when you have a mobile fortress whenever your cooldowns are up and you feel like fucking someone's game up.
